    Case study

    Building connections to achieve $5 million savings goal

    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Maecenas maximus nibh est, at accumsan mauris luctus non. Donec lectus ligula, iaculis in erat sit amet, ultricies semper elit. Nulla quis pellentesque neque. Donec vulputate quis erat tristique finibus. Nam sodales ex nisl, ut iaculis risus lacinia eu. Donec vulputate quis erat tristique finibus.     Suppliers chain search result title 1

    Case study

    DCH Health System, facing the potential for significant revenue reductions, set a highly ambitious savings goal of $5 million per year. Working with Vizient data and consultants, the DCH team not only surpassed the goal by nearly $1 million, they also built new relationships with both suppliers and physicians that will provide ongoing opportunities for savings.
